entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of light snow near noon. Clearing this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 17.
